menu_options.energyusagecontrollable: Non-interruptible device is to be controlled by the SHM2.
menu_options.energyusagecontrollableinterruptable: Interruptible device to be controlled by SHM2.

data_description.minrunningtime: Minimum running time within the timeframe specified in the calander.
data_description.maxrunningtime: Maximum running time within the timeframe specified in the calander.
data_description.calendar: The calendar defines the timeframe in which the device should run. The running time depends on the Minimum and Maxium running time.
data_description.minontime: If the device is switched on, it has to remain on for at least this duration.
data_description.minofftime: If the device is switched off, it has to remain off for at least this duration.
